user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]

Authenticate and login the user.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Redirects to the index page if authentication is successful, otherwise re-renders the login page with an error message.

Return type:

HttpResponse
